name: YouTube Rounded [WIP] [v1.3]
description:
YouTube Rounded is a style that basically adds a border radius to (mostly) everything. Giving a better look and feel to the website. This style also includes a handful of animations and such.

1,343 Lines of code, and counting (including blank lines and such)

Warning: This style MIGHT slow down videos, depending on your computer speed.

This style is a Work in Progress. So it will be updated very frequently. So be sure to check back to this page for new updates.
